channel.title: Keebshelf - Mechanical Keyboard News
channel.description: Latest mechanical keyboard group buys, in-stock drops, and guides from Keebshelf.

item.title: New Content: Complete Switch Buying Guide 2025
item.description: Learn the differences between linear, tactile, and clicky switches. Find the perfect switch for gaming, typing, or work with detailed comparisons and recommendations.

item.title: New Content: Best Mechanical Keyboards for Programming 2025
item.description: Top 5 mechanical keyboards for programmers and developers. From budget picks to premium options for Vim users.

item.title: New Content: How to Lube Mechanical Switches - Complete Guide
item.description: Step-by-step tutorial for lubing mechanical keyboard switches. Tools needed, lube types, process, and common mistakes to avoid.

item.title: Guide: The Real Cost of Building Your First Custom Mechanical Keyboard
item.description: Realistic budget breakdown for first-time builders. The hidden costs, tools, and what you actually need to spend.

item.title: Beginner Guide: What is a Mechanical Keyboard?
item.description: No jargon, no gatekeeping. Just answers about what makes mechanical keyboards different and how to choose your first one.
